Reviews.Title: Fine value
Reviews.Author: M. Churchman
Reviews.Content: Good simple device worked great right out of the box. Simple to use and worked well in our totally dark environment.

ProductInfo.Features:
Affordable day night video CMOS security camera
36 IR illuminators for night vision. 6.0mm Lens
Built-in light sensor controls IR activation. Metal body housing, mount and sun shade
Free adjustable camera swivel mount for easy installation. 420TVL
Package included: 1 of CMOS camera, 1 of 12V DC 500mA power supply for camera, 1 of video power extension cable, 1 of free security warning decal
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Outdoor Day Night Vision IR CCTV Home Security Camera 420TVL 36 Infrared Illumination LEDs with Power Supply and Extension Cable CTB
